summary: In 1994 South Korea, a female North Korean spy integrates herself as a housekeeper for U.S. military officer to steal classified documents, but soon worries about her cover when she falls for the teenage son of the officer.
cast: Jane March|Stephen Mendel|Lillo Brancato|Nick Mancuso|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Sarah May|Bryn McAuley|Daniel Brochu|Charles Edwin Powell|Zhenhu Han|Joseph Kim|Eleanor Noble|Claudia Besso|Frank Fontaine|Peter Colvey|Thinh Truong Nguyen|Uni Park|Steve Banner|Amber Lumiere|Nancy Tong|Bonnie Mak|Norris Domingue|Jude Beny|Tom Rack|Jean Gu√©rin|Jeremy Ijay Lavalles|Larry Day|Michel Trinh|Fernando Chien|Russell Yuen|David Mak|Huy Phong Doan|Daniel Do|Kwasi Songui|Mike Chute|Jun-ho Kim|Jason Cavalier|Wei Feng Tang|Dave McKewen
title: Provocateur
